When a tried to return a resource (using XMLResourceImpl.getContentAsSAX)
whose root element has more than five namespace declarations, I get the
following exception:

org.xmldb.api.base.XMLDBException:
	at
org.apache.xindice.core.FaultCodes.createXMLDBException(FaultCodes.java:247)
	at
org.apache.xindice.client.xmldb.resources.XMLResourceImpl.getContentAsSAX(XM
LResourceImpl.java:418)
	...

I'm using the 1.0 zipped distribution. I looked into the source code and
found that the problem lies in processContainer(...) in
SAXEventGenerator.java at line 325. The line:

	System.arraycopy(mappedPrefixes, 0, newBuf, 0, newBuf.length);

Should read:

	System.arraycopy(mappedPrefixes, 0, newBuf, 0, mappedPrefixes.length);

There's an unchecked IndexOutOfBoundsException being thrown because the
length property of System.arraycopy should be the length of mappedPrefixes
NOT newBuf. The latest version in CVS, which I updated to for better
namespace handling including default namespaces, still has this problem.
